newsitem.title: USA: Arterial Vascular names Solano pres, CEO.
newsitem.headline: Arterial Vascular names Solano pres, CEO.

text.p: Arterial Vascular Engineering Inc said Monday it has named Scott Solano president and chief executive officer, succeeding Brad Jendersee, who remains as chairman of the board.

Solano previously served as chief operating officer of the company, which sells stent and balloon angioplasty systems for treatment of coronary artery disease in more than 40 countries outside the U.S.
